title: Large Family Home with 4Bed/ 3 Baths
posting_body: A great solution for first-time home buyers.
No more packing and moving once your agreement is up!
The stately home promises ample living space.
Its 4 furnished bedrooms, 3 baths and well-appointed kitchen allow you to set up home from the day you move in.
The home boasts of a backyard paradise; a place where you can take all your parties in warmer weather.
Understand our rent-to-own terms and make this your HOME.
